name: Ordensstaat Burgund
startIntroPart1: The world shall see the black sun rise over them all and we will rule over them under the great new order. For there is no hope under the black sun.
declaringWar: For the world shall be under the black sun orders!
attacked: As you wish. You'll see the black sun's wrath!
defeated: You just see the old dawn, then you'll see the new rise of the great Reich!
introduction: For the world shall see the black sun rise over the great Reich!
